test_cases.message: Class 'ClientRecord' uses 'Client' instead of 'Patient'
Class 'CustomerProfile' uses 'Customer' instead of 'Patient'
Variable 'case_file' uses 'Case' instead of 'Patient'
Method 'get_person_data' uses 'Person' instead of 'Patient'
Class 'PatientVisit' uses 'Visit' instead of 'Appointment'
Class 'DoctorMeeting' uses 'Meeting' instead of 'Appointment'
Method 'schedule_consultation' uses 'Consultation' instead of 'Appointment'
Class 'TherapySession' uses 'Session' instead of 'Appointment'
Class 'MedicalProcedure' uses 'Procedure' instead of 'Treatment'
Class 'CareService' uses 'Service' instead of 'Treatment'
Variable 'therapy_plan' uses 'Therapy' instead of 'Treatment'
Method 'apply_intervention' uses 'Intervention' instead of 'Treatment'
Class 'MedicationOrder' uses 'Order' instead of 'Prescription'
Variable 'rx_script' uses 'Script' instead of 'Prescription'
Class 'MedicationList' uses 'Medication' instead of 'Prescription'
Method 'prescribe_drug' uses 'Drug' instead of 'Prescription'
Class 'PatientManager' violates banned term 'Manager' - use PatientRepository
Class 'AppointmentHelper' violates banned term 'Helper' - use domain-specific name
Class 'DiagnosisUtil' violates banned term 'Util' - use DiagnosisValidator
Class 'PatientData' violates banned term 'Data' - use Patient entity
Class 'PrescriptionHandler' violates banned term 'Handler' - use specific name
Class 'TreatmentManager' violates banned term 'Manager' - use TreatmentRepository
Class 'MedicalUtility' violates banned term 'Utility' - use specific domain name
Class 'RecordHandler' violates banned term 'Handler' - use RecordKeeper
AppointmentScheduling importing from PrescriptionManagement violates boundaries
Direct import from appointment_scheduling to prescription_management not allowed
PrescriptionManagement.get_appointment() directly accessing AppointmentScheduling
Cross-context dependency must go through TreatmentPlanning context
AppointmentScheduled event not published in schedule_appointment method
Missing AppointmentConfirmed event after patient confirmation
TreatmentPrescribed event not triggered in prescribe_treatment method
PrescriptionIssued event missing when Prescription entity is created
MedicalHistory implemented as entity instead of value object
AppointmentType using string instead of enum value object
Diagnosis should be immutable value object with ICD codes
Medication value object missing drug_name and strength attributes
Patient entity missing unique medical_record_number identifier
Appointment entity lacks appointment_id and scheduled_time fields
Treatment entity missing treatment_id and description attributes
Prescription entity requires prescription_number and dosage fields
Class name 'emergencyContact' should be PascalCase 'EmergencyContact'
Class name 'treatmentPlan' violates PascalCase naming convention
TreatmentPlan aggregate missing invariant enforcement for treatment coordination
EmergencyContact should be value object with name and phone attributes
AppointmentScheduling must depend on PatientManagement to retrieve patient info
TreatmentPlanning accessing Patient without going through PatientManagement
PrescriptionManagement bypassing TreatmentPlanning for medication alignment
AppointmentStatus should be enum value object with Scheduled, Completed values
Dosage value object needs quantity, frequency, and route attributes
PrescriptionFilled event not raised when pharmacy dispenses medication
